## Car Accidents

If you’ve been injured in a car or truck accident – Let Tlusty, Kennedy &
Glascock help you get back to doing the things you enjoy.

Contact our office now!

## Divorce Mediation

Divorce Mediation is an alternative to contested divorce that saves time and
money by helping couples resolve their differences.

More About Divorce Mediation

## Community

Tlusty, Kennedy & Glascock have an unrivaled reputation for quality and
service here in the Wausau Metro Area.

Contact our office now!

PreviousNext

123

# Car Accidents

Have you been injured in a car, truck or SUV accident in Central Wisconsin?
Our Wausau Area law firm is here to help you recover from your injuries and
ensure you receive the settlement you deserve.

Learn more…

# Dog Bites

A dog bite can be an expensive personal injury that may require emergency
medical attention, hospitalization and surgery. If you or your child have been
bitten, mauled or injured by a dog, know and protect your rights.

Learn more…

# Divorce Mediation

Divorce Mediation helps separating couples _negotiate the terms of their own
divorce_. Both parties  _must be willing_  to  _work together_  to reach
consensus.

Learn more…

## Schedule a free consultation.

We’re ready to help.

Contact our office now!

##

## Meet Our Attorneys

#### Jessica J. Tlusty

Jessica specializes in personal injury law, concentrating on car accidents and
dog bites. Additionally, she focuses on divorce mediation. She was born in
Wausau and graduated from Marquette University and William Mitchell College of
Law.

#### Zachary P. Glascock

Zach focuses on family law, divorce mediation and criminal defense. He was
raised in Wausau and graduated Cum Laude from the University of Wisconsin
Oshkosh with a Bachelor of Science Degree in Criminal Justice.

#### Bradley A. Kennedy

Brad was born in Phillips, Wisconsin. He graduated from UW-Superior with dual
Bachelor’s Degrees in Political Science and History. He also has a Master’s
Degree in Finance  from the University of Wisconsin-Madison.

#### Jerome P. Tlusty

Jerry was born in Medford, Wisconsin. He received a Bachelor of Science in
Business Administration from Marquette University, and then received his Juris
Doctorate degree from Marquette University Law School.

##

## Testimonials

> I contacted Jessica after I was in a motor vehicle accident that totaled my
> vehicle and left me with surgery and rehab. Jessica was very kind throughout
> the whole process and made sure that I understood everything before moving
> forward. She always gave a reply within hours of me reaching out and never
> left me in the dark with where my case was headed and it’s status. My
> accident was November of 2020. It is now October of 2021 and we settled two
> days ago. She was even able to get me almost double what the other insurance
> wanted to pay out. If you’re looking for reliability and success Jessica is
> the way to go!

Desiree

> I contacted Jessica after I was involved in a canine incident. I felt very
> comfortable with her right away. Her and her team were very responsive with
> my questions and concerns, and guided me on steps to take. When it came to
> settlement time she fought for me to increase my settlement. I would
> definitely recommend her services.

Jenna

> When you contacted me, after I inquired in regard to the suit, I must say I
> was totally surprised by you. You were very willing to explain everything in
> detail — what you were, what I would do and the results. And I must say only
> two words — thank you. What a patient and just plain nice group of people I
> dealt with.

> Jessica truly cared about the outcome of my case. She kept me informed and
> in touch with what was going on. She was firm with the insurance company(s)
> when negotiating settlement. Jessica worked hard for me, got me a great
> settlement, and charged less than most attorneys.

Rose

> The injury to my back was not only painful but stressful. Tlusty, Kennedy
> and Glascock, S.C. handled everything very professionally and efficiently.
> They made sure all of the bases were covered and it cost me nothing unless
> they were successful. They secured some financial stability for me and my
> family during a rough time.

> Someone is always available to take a call and answer your question or
> return a call. Attorneys and staff are sympathetic and understanding.

> My child was in an car accident and heard about Jessica from a friend.
> Everything she told me about her was what I needed to hear to make the move
> to hire her for the case. Jessica and her team did a great job and handle
> everything. Knowing that I was in good hands made me feel less overwhelmed.
> Thank you, Jessica for all your hard work!

Brooke

> When I knew I needed legal advice, I had no doubt who to call. Jessica
> provided not only great legal advice, but compassion for my case. She was
> professional and made sure I understood my legal rights, taking time to
> explain the entire process. I chose Jessica to represent me through my
> divorce, seeking the settlement I deserved.

Patricia Gustafson
